EmailTemplate.name: Axos - DepOps - Vesting Request Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Change Request Cancellation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
The requested information was not received by the [INSERT DATE] deadline. Your change request has been canceled.
If you would like to submit a new consumer change request please remember to include the Change Request form and all other requested documents.
Send your new Change Request to:
1) Mail to: Axos Bank, Attn: New Accounts, P.O. Box 911039, San Diego, CA 92191-1039 2) Email to: customerservice@axosbank.com 3) Fax to: 858-350-0443
Questions? If you have any questions, please call us at (888) 502-2967 or email us at customerservice@axosbank.com
Thank you.
Best Regards, {!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
